name: World Earn & Play Community
description: WEPC is a utility token for the play-and-earn ecosystem based on the Ethereum chain. The project aims to build a comprehensive ecosystem of play-to-earn games, where players can earn tokens, purchase in-game inventory, trade items, and withdraw them to exchanges. The plan includes developing 10 major games across various genres by 2030. Other game developers can join the ecosystem and develop their projects within this unified system.
